Error: por favor revise que el Sistema d: Warning: Please, review the spatial reference system
Error al cargar la capa: An error has occurred while loading the layers
No info: No information exists for selected point
AllowedFormats: Allowed formats are: KML, GPX, GeoJSON
DifferentFormats: File extension and selected format are different
ProjectionDifferent: Not possible loading the service, the projection of the map bases is different from service projection
400: Bad Request. The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing)
404: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found
408: Request Timeout. The server timed out waiting for the request
409: Conflict. Indicates that the request could not be processed because of conflict in the request
421: Misdirected Request. The request was directed at a server that is not able to produce a response (for example because a connection reuse)
500: Internal Server Error due to the applications running on the server
502: Bad Gateway. The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and received an invalid response from the upstream server
503: Service Unavailable Temporarily. The server is currently unavailable (because it is overloaded or down for maintenance)
504: Gateway Timeout. The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a timely response from the upstream server
